titlealts.searchtitle: NHS Business Definition: Pathology Laboratory Investigation - Description

div.p: A Pathology Laboratory Investigation is a Clinical Investigation.

A Pathology Laboratory Investigation Â is a single (Laboratory) service resulting from a DIAGNOSTIC TEST REQUEST, to be carried out in respect of a specified subject of investigation that leads to the production of one or more results.
This item is not referenced in a data set in the NHS Data Model and Dictionary. It has been retained for information.
